page.title: 20Corvedale News
page.content: Corvedale News is a community magazine produced by the{Anglican and{Methodist}Churches in Corvedale. It comes out once a month and costs 15p. Miss Fuller is the editor. The first page always has a letter to everyone from Rev.I.Gibbs. In the June issue there are also articles by Abdon Flower Club ,the Clover Club ,1st Corvedale Guides, Munslow W.I and Corvedale Ladies Club . There was an announcement of a forth - coming event to celebrate the Silver Anniversery year of Corvedale and di- strict British Legion and the church fete on 8th June 1985 and Broadstone chapel ceiling fund. News items included the baptism of Leanne Price at the Methodist Church on 5th of May and the return to Diddl- ebury of the Corfields from Cyprus where Patrick was RAF P.E.Instructor.
